description: This file appears to be a C++ source file containing mock implementations for testing OVS (Open vSwitch) related functionalities, specifically mocking functions that interact with OVS configuration and interaction APIs. It includes external references to a mock class and defines linkage for these mock functions.

methods.name: bool ovs_agent_api_get_config(OVS_TABLE table,void ** ppConfig)
methods.description: A mock function that retrieves OVS configuration, forwarding the call to the g_ovsMock instance if available.

methods.name: bool ovs_agent_api_interact(ovs_interact_request * request,ovs_interact_cb callback)
methods.description: A mock function that performs an OVS interaction request, forwarding the call to the g_ovsMock instance if available.
